jobDescription: The Manager, Analytics plays an integral role in delivering online marketing insights to clients by working alongside the iCrossing Strategy and Media teams to lead the strategic elements of Web analytics and Media reporting. This position provides significant value to our teams and clients, requiring not only quantitative data analysis skills, knowledge of various Web/Marketing analytics tools, but also a true passion for data and the relevant information that it can provide.  Responsibilities  Interact directly with company clients and offer thoughtful and deliberate strategy around website user experience and media campaign execution.  Collaborate with external and internal teams to solidify findings and improve campaign performance and user experience  Maintain a functional expertise in Web Analytics (Adobe Analytics skills are essential)  Execute digital and multi-channel campaign measurement and analysis, test designs, ad-hoc analysis, and present conclusions to clients, Account and Media teams  Leverage advertising data and client internal data to provide insights and information to make marketing programs optimally effective  Gather business requirements and identifies measures, approaches and methodologies for measuring success against objectives  Apply various quantitative methods to analyze and interpret information from multiple data sources as needed  Develop actionable recommendations and communicate them in an easy to digest manner  Work with marketing stakeholders to leverage personas, customer journeys, and data strategies to develop and implement marketing automation programs Qualifications:
